conference.title: Longhorn PHP 2018
conference.summary: The Austin PHP Meetup, the longest-running tech meetup in Texas’ capital, is excited to announce a brand-new PHP conference: Longhorn PHP. 2018 will be the inaugural year for Longhorn PHP, which follows in the tradition of the now-retired Lone Star PHP conference in Dallas.
conference.content:
The Austin PHP Meetup, the longest-running tech meetup in Texas’ capital, is excited to announce a brand-new PHP conference: Longhorn PHP. 2018 will be the inaugural year for Longhorn PHP, which follows in the tradition of the now-retired Lone Star PHP conference in Dallas.
At Longhorn PHP you’ll get to learn from and alongside a diverse group of developers from all over the region, country, and even the globe. The conference will consist of one tutorial day with in-depth workshops, and two main conference days with multiple tracks of traditional 1 hour sessions. [Register now](https://www.longhornphp.com/register/) to take the next step toward leveling up your development career!
**Dates:** April 19th-21st, 2018
**Website:** <https://www.longhornphp.com>
